steps.title: Azurill is a Normal Fairy–type Pokémon and is weak against Poison and Steel.
steps.content: Azurill is a Normal Fairy–type Pokémon and is weak against Poison and Steel. Avoid battling these types of Pokémon using Azurill.

steps.title: Azurill has strong resistance against Dragon-types and Ghost-types.
steps.content: Azurill has strong resistance against Dragon-types and Ghost-types. Azurill will take little to no damage when attacked by these types of Pokémon.

steps.title: Azurill is the baby and first form of a 3-stage evolution.
steps.content: Azurill is the baby and first form of a 3-stage evolution. So, don’t pit Azurill against high-level Pokémon.

steps.title: Friendship level measures how attached the Pokémon is to its trainer.
steps.content: Friendship level measures how attached the Pokémon is to its trainer. You can increase Friendship by using held items like a Soothe Bell, which makes the Pokémon holding it friendly. Most Pokémon evolve when their Friendship level reaches 220.
